Direct Billing for Select Insurers

We offer direct billing for select insurers, including major providers like Canada Life, Manulife, and Green Shield. View the full list of eligible insurers to see if yours is covered. We also offer direct billing for services such as Autism Funding and the Crime Victims Assistance Program (CVAP).

Have questions? Contact us to check if direct billing is available for your plan.

About Dr. Benjamin Schulz

Dr. Schulz is a professional, licensed Christian therapist you can trust. He is recognized as one of the best therapists in his field, he offers in-person counselling in Langley, Surrey, and Vancouver, as well as virtual therapy across BC and Alberta. Dr. Schulz specializes in depression, anxiety, couples therapy, marriage counselling, substance abuse, career counselling, PTSD, ADHD, OCD, and autism, providing compassionate, faith-based support to help clients heal and thrive.

  • Canadian Certified Counsellor (CCC) BC (British Columbia)
  • Register Provisional Psychologist Alberta
  • PhD, Doctor of Philosophy in Educational Psychology, University of Victoria
  • MA, Master of Arts in Counselling Psychology, Trinity Western University
  • BA, Honours Psychology, University of Waterloo

My Areas of Expertise

Individual Counselling

Are you struggling with life challenges at home, school, or work? Feeling overwhelmed by stress, anxiety, or uncertainty? I offer professional, evidence-based support to help you navigate these challenges.

Numerous individual counselling services include:

  • Depression Counselling – Overcome feelings of sadness, hopelessness, and fatigue with expert therapy tailored to your needs.
  • Anxiety Treatment – Manage stress, panic attacks, and constant worry through proven therapeutic techniques.
  • Career Challenges & Transitions – Navigate workplace stress, career changes, or job dissatisfaction with professional guidance.
  • PTSD Therapy & Trauma Recovery – Heal from past trauma, reduce flashbacks, and regain control over your life.
  • OCD Treatment & Support – Break free from obsessive thoughts and compulsive behaviours with specialized therapy.

Couples Counselling

Whether you're strengthening your relationship, overcoming disconnection, or breaking free from unhealthy patterns and past baggage, I can help you foster healthy communication and lasting connection.

Numerous couples counselling services include:

  • Communication & Conflict Resolution – Improve communication and resolve conflicts effectively.
  • Pre-Marital Counselling – Prepare for marriage by discussing expectations, values, and potential challenges.
  • Trust & Infidelity Recovery – Rebuild trust and heal after infidelity or betrayal.
  • Emotional Intimacy & Connection – Strengthen emotional bonds and deepen intimacy.
  • Stress & Life Transitions – Navigate major life changes such as career shifts, relocation, or health challenges.
  • Blended Family Counselling – Support step-parenting and blended family dynamics.

Marriage Counselling

Whether you're strengthening your relationship, overcoming disconnection, or breaking free from unhealthy patterns and past baggage, I can help you foster healthy communication and lasting connection.

Numerous marriage counselling services include:

  • Marriage Enrichment & Maintenance – Strengthen and maintain a fulfilling, long-term relationship.
  • Conflict Management in Marriage – Learn constructive ways to handle disagreements.
  • Rebuilding After Betrayal or Divorce Consideration – Explore whether to repair or end the marriage.
  • Financial Stress & Money Management – Address financial conflicts and create a healthy approach to budgeting.
  • Work-Life Balance for Couples – Find harmony between career, personal life, and marriage.
  • Crisis Intervention & Separation Counselling – Navigate major crises, separations, or reconciliations.
  • Parenting & Co-Parenting Support – Work together to manage parenting challenges and co-parent effectively.

    • Read More

Adolescent Counselling

Is your teenage child struggling—losing direction in life, experiencing a drop in academic performance, or engaging in substance use? I’ve helped over 200 teens overcome school-related anxiety and social pressures, regain focus, and reach their full potential.

Numerous Adolescent counselling services include:

  • Anxiety & Stress Management – Help teens cope with academic pressure, social anxiety, and everyday stress.
  • Depression & Mood Disorders – Provide support for teens struggling with sadness, low motivation, or emotional imbalances.
  • Academic Challenges & Motivation – Assist in improving focus, time management, and study habits to enhance performance.
  • Self-Esteem & Confidence Building – Help teens develop a positive self-image and greater self-worth.
  • Peer Pressure & Social Skills – Guide teens in handling peer pressure, making healthy friendships, and improving communication.
  • Family & Parent-Teen Conflict Resolution – Strengthen relationships by improving communication and understanding between teens and parents.
  • Substance Use & Risky Behavior Prevention – Provide guidance for overcoming substance use and making safer life choices.
  • Identity & Self-Discovery – Support teens in exploring their values, goals, and personal identity.
  • Career & Future Planning – Help teens explore career paths, set goals, and prepare for life beyond high school.
  • Emotional Regulation & Anger Management – Teach healthy ways to manage emotions and respond to challenging situations.
  • Bullying & Cyberbullying Support – Help teens cope with bullying, build resilience, and develop strategies to respond.

    • Read More

What others are saying about Dr. Ben Schulz

A Safe Space to Heal

I was worried about sharing my issue with Ben, but to my surprise, opening up to him was easier than I expected. After our consultation, I decided to start treatment, and ever since then, I’ve been feeling better every day.

Contact Us

We understand that deciding to see a therapist for yourself or a loved one is an important step. Feel free to share a little about yourself or request a free 15-minute phone consultation. We’d love to get to know you and help determine if Dr. Schulz is the right fit for you. We'll get back to you within 24 hours , and we look forward to connecting with you soon.
